Home » 36P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 2 Kusalattika » 2.1 Paṭiccavāra » 2.1.3 Paccayānulomapaccanīya » Hetuduka
Tevīsaka (savipāka)
Kusalattika
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayānulomapaccanīya
Hetuduka
Tevīsaka (savipāka)
285Hetupaccayā ārammaṇapaccayā…pe…  purejātapaccayā kammapaccayā vipākapaccayā āhārapaccayā indriyapaccayā jhānapaccayā maggapaccayā sampayuttapaccayā vippayuttapaccayā atthipaccayā natthipaccayā vigatapaccayā avigatapaccayā napacchājāte ekaṃ, naāsevane ekaṃ.
286Hetumūlakaṃ.
